about.title: About Me

about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with a love for creating beautiful, functional web applications. With expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean code and thoughtful design.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: I build responsive and dynamic websites using the MERN stack. One of my main projects includes creating a full-featured apparel website with product pages, user authentication, and modern UI components. I also develop scalable full-stack applications with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js, including e-commerce features like secure login, product management, and responsive design.

mobile.title: Communication & Teamwork
mobile.description: I communicate clearly and work effectively in team environments. Through school projects and my internship, I've learned how to share ideas, listen actively, and collaborate with both technical and non-technical members. I enjoy contributing to a positive workflow and helping teams stay organized and focused.

ui.title: UI/UX Design
ui.description: I design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces with a focus on simple layouts and smooth user experience. I apply modern design principles to create clean, user-friendly interfaces that make products easy and enjoyable to use.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: I provide practical advice on choosing the right technologies, designing full-stack architecture, and improving development workflow. With experience in MERN, React, and Spring Boot, I help students and small teams build efficient and scalable applications.
